result.adr_address: Mykoly Mikhnovskoho Blvd, 1, Kyiv, Ukraine, 02000
result.name: ТОВ «Суші Тайм Україна»

reviews.text: The order was delivered in 20 minutes from Druzhba to Levoberezhka, this time also includes cooking! The order was delivered, the courier gave it and took the money. Didn't provide a receipt! When unpacking they didn’t find any receipt! And they brought the wrong set that we ordered! We started writing to support and they started being really rude! And to prove that why didn’t we demand a check from the courier?! They refused to deliver what we ordered and what we paid for! Ruined the evening! I'm still waiting for this problem to be solved! Because this is unacceptable

This is a terrible office that has not been able to deliver sushi for 3 hours. For 35 minutes I ask you to tell me where the courier is, they promise me that he will call back, but I never received a call from him. If you want to be hungry, order. But don’t pay upfront so you can refuse and let the courier eat them himself. I really regret that I paid in advance.

(About delivery)
Bottom, sorry.
We ordered a set of rolls + additional ginger and wasabi to the set
When they brought it, we didn’t immediately see that there was something wrong with the set. What caught my eye was that there were no extras. ginger with wasabi
I called the call center and described the problem. I was asked to describe what the set looks like and was told that this is not the set that we ordered. But the operators do not solve these problems, they say, you need to contact the manager on Viber. OK. And here is the most “pleasant” part of the whole story. The manager refused any help, feeding me apologies and excuses that someone had mixed something up. They refused to return the money or compensate in the form of our order. directed by robert b weide
This is rudeness and theft. I have never seen such an attitude anywhere. This is the first and last time I deal with these charlatans.

I waited 3 hours for delivery, instead of 2, the most terrible attitude towards customers, hire several couriers, not just one, I will never order sushi here again in my life, it’s disgusting, I’m always loyal when delivery is delayed by 30 minutes, anything can happen, but even 1 star for you a lot
